headline: Brent crude oil price rebounds, Caterpillar hits $300B market cap
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton tracks Tuesday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Oil (CL=F, BZ=F) prices are rallying on geopolitical tensions, with Brent crude oil crossing $65 for the first time since November. Caterpillar (CAT) crossed $300 billion in market capitalization for the first time. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Caterpillar Stock Hits This Milestone. Yes, It’s AI.
summary: Caterpillar  shares were up 1.7% in midday trading at $640.69, while the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average were down 0.2% and 0.6%, respectively.  If Cat stock can close around $641, it will be the first close above $300 billion, according to Dow Jones Market Data.  Cat stock first closed with a market value above $200 billion on Nov. 6, 2024.

headline: Caterpillar Crosses $300 Billion in Market Value on AI Rally
summary: Because of its business selling power-generation equipment, Caterpillar has been a runaway winner in a market where investors are hungry for secondary AI plays after the valuations of major technology and semiconductor companies soared.  Exuberance around data-center-driven demand for power generation has helped the company “support a record backlog,” Bloomberg Intelligence analyst Christopher Ciolino said.

headline: 5 Hidden AI Winners Transforming Traditional Industries in 2026
summary: While investors chase high-profile AI chip makers and tech giants, a quieter transformation is unfolding across traditional industries. Companies in healthcare, retail, financial services, and logistics are deploying AI to optimize operations, reduce costs, and improve margins. These “secret” AI plays leverage machine learning, computer vision, and agentic commerce to drive efficiency gains that show ... 5 Hidden AI Winners Transforming Traditional Industries in 2026
